titles: Wonders no miracles, or, Mr. Valentine Greatrates gift of healing examined upon occasion of a sad effect of his stroaking, March the 7, 1665, at one Mr. Cressets house in Charter-house-yard : in a letter to a reverend divine, living near that place.
author: Lloyd, David, 1635-1692.
notes: Attributed to D. Lloyd. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
keywords: Quacks and quackery --  Early works to 1800.
